text: (gentle music)
- My name is Ashley Zhang

and I'm a Cloud Solution
Center Account Manager.
I have been with AWS for two years.

I was part of the AWS Sales
Internship back in 2019.
The internship was incredible.
It was my first exposure into cloud
and technology as well as sales
and it was such a safe space
and a great place to grow my career
and just really develop as well

and got to learn more about
the art of the possible
with the cloud and I feel so grateful
now I get to share that with my customers.
One of the most memorable experiences
and highlights for my internship

was actually touring an
Amazon fulfillment center

where we got to see AWS
technology come to life.
There are so many aha moments every day.

We like to say it's always
day one here at AWS and Amazon

and just today, I learned
how I'm able to partner

with my customer in working
on sustainability issues
and using the cloud to really move forward

in those innovations, which
has been really exciting

and I think there's been
a lot of opportunities
to dive into inclusion, diversity,

and equity with our partners
and customers as well.

There's also opportunities for
you to create your own thing.

So a few of my colleagues
and I are podcast enthusiasts
and we also have a passion for ID&E.
So we decided to write a PR/FAQ,

which is a Amazon mechanism
where you can think big

and come up with idea and
make it into a reality.

So a few friends and I got
together and we're really scrappy

and put together an internal
podcast where we share
and highlight and amplify voices

of those who are
underrepresented in technologies

and it's a way to promote
allyship within our organization.

Joining AWS was one of the best
decisions I've made so far.

It's such a rewarding
place to grow your career
and you truly get to learn and be curious

and explore so many different
avenues within Amazon.
Here, you could go anywhere.
(gentle music)
